createClient.description: Create a new instance of the AJAX client

params.name: sTokenUrl
params.description: An available URL to fetch a fresh CSRF token from

params.name: mDefaultHeaders
params.description: The default headers to be used with all outgoing calls unless specified

params.name: oAuthentication
params.description: Contains the authentication type and the appropriate credentials, currently only Basic Auth is supported

returns.description: a new configured AJAX client instance
